      • consume

        public void consume(java.lang.String itemName,
                    int quantity,
                    Inventory inventory)
             throws ItemNotFoundException,
                    InsufficientQuantityException,
                    NotConsumableException,
                    OutOfActionsException
        Use an action to consume some item
        Parameters:
        itemName - The name of the item
        quantity - The quantity which should be consumed
        inventory - The inventory to take the item from
        Throws:
        ItemNotFoundException - if the item isn't found in the inventory
        InsufficientQuantityException - if the inventory doesn't contain enough of the item
        NotConsumableException - if the item isn't consumable
        OutOfActionsException - if the crew member is out of actions

      • outOfActionsToday

        public boolean outOfActionsToday()
        Is the crew member out of actions today
        Returns:
        true if no actions remaining, false otherwise
